languages.text: "В таком случае господин ван Калокс продолжит сопровождать вас. И мне будет спокойнее знать, что есть, кому о вас позаботиться". {n}Последняя реплика инквизитора звучит двусмысленно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "В таком случае, господин ван Калокс продолжит службу вам".

languages.text: "Then Master van Calox will remain in place. It puts me at ease to know that there is someone to watch over you." {n}Calcazar's last remark sounds ambiguous.{/n}
languages.original_text: "В таком случае господин ван Калокс продолжит сопровождать вас. И мне будет спокойнее знать, что есть, кому о вас позаботиться". {n}Последняя реплика инквизитора звучит двусмысленно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Then Master van Calox will continue to keep you company. It puts me at ease to know that there is someone who can take care of you." {n}Xavier's last remark sounds ambiguous.{/n}
"Then Master van Calox will continue to keep you company. It puts me at ease to know that there is someone who can take care of you." {n}Xavier's last remark sounds ambiguous.{/n}
"Then Master van Calox will remain in place. It puts me at ease to know that there is someone to watch over you." {n}Calcazar's last remark sounds ambiguous.{/n}
"Then Master van Calox will remain in place. It puts me at ease to know that there is someone to watch over you." {n}Calcazar's last remark sounds ambiguous.{/n}
"Then Master van Calox will remain in place. It puts me at ease to know that there is someone to watch over you." {n}Calcazar's last remark sounds ambiguous.{/n}

languages.text: 「ならばマスター・ヴァン・カロックスは自由開拓者の下に留まるがよい。お前を監視するものがいるなら私も安心だ。」{n}カルカサルの最後の一言は色んな意味にとれる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then Master van Calox will remain in place. It puts me at ease to know that there is someone to watch over you." {n}Calcazar's last remark sounds ambiguous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ならばマスター・ヴァン・カロックスは自由開拓者の下に留まるがよい。お前を監視するものがいるなら私も安心だ。」{n}カルカサルの最後の一言は色んな意味にとれる。{/n}

languages.original_text: "Then Master van Calox will remain in place. It puts me at ease to know that there is someone to watch over you." {n}Calcazar's last remark sounds ambiguous.{/n}

languages.text: “既然如此，让冯·卡洛克斯大师留下吧。有人在身边照看你，我就放心多了。”{n}卡尔卡扎语带双关地说道。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then Master van Calox will remain in place. It puts me at ease to know that there is someone to watch over you." {n}Calcazar's last remark sounds ambiguous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，让冯·卡洛克斯大师留下吧。有人在身边照看你，我就放心多了。”{n}卡尔卡扎语带双关地说道。{/n}

languages.text: «En ese caso, el maestro van Calox seguirá en su puesto. Me tranquilizará saber que hay alguien velando por usted». {n}Este último comentario de Calcazar suena bastante ambiguo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then Master van Calox will remain in place. It puts me at ease to know that there is someone to watch over you." {n}Calcazar's last remark sounds ambiguous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «En ese caso, el maestro van Calox seguirá en su puesto. Me tranquilizará saber que hay alguien velando por usted». {n}Este último comentario de Calcazar suena bastante ambiguo.{/n}

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, maître van Calox restera à son poste. Je dois dire qu'il est rassurant d'avoir quelqu'un qui vous garde à l'œil. » {n}Cette dernière remarque vous paraît légèrement ambiguë.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then Master van Calox will remain in place. It puts me at ease to know that there is someone to watch over you." {n}Calcazar's last remark sounds ambiguous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, maître van Calox restera à son poste. Je dois dire qu'il est rassurant d'avoir quelqu'un qui vous garde à l'œil. » {n}Cette dernière remarque vous paraît légèrement ambiguë.{/n}

languages.text: "Dann wird Meister van Calox an seinem Platz bleiben. Es beruhigt mich, dass jemand ein Auge auf Euch haben wird." {n}Calcazars letzte Anmerkung klingt zweideutig.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then Master van Calox will remain in place. It puts me at ease to know that there is someone to watch over you." {n}Calcazar's last remark sounds ambiguous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Dann wird Meister van Calox an seinem Platz bleiben. Es beruhigt mich, dass jemand ein Auge auf Euch haben wird." {n}Calcazars letzte Anmerkung klingt zweideutig.{/n}

languages.text: "Öyleyse Üstat van Calox burada kalmayı sürdürecek. Seni gözeten birilerinin olduğunu bilmek, içimi rahatlatır hem." {n}Calcazar'ın son sözcükleri, iki farklı anlam taşıyor gibi.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then Master van Calox will remain in place. It puts me at ease to know that there is someone to watch over you." {n}Calcazar's last remark sounds ambiguous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Öyleyse Üstat van Calox burada kalmayı sürdürecek. Seni gözeten birilerinin olduğunu bilmek benim de içimi rahatlatır." {n}Calcazar'ın son sözcükleri iki farklı anlam taşıyor gibi.{/n}
